function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in service ecosystems","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection within the community","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation practices, promoting social distancing, and enforcing mask-wearing policies","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV sanitation devices, and air purification systems","People":"Community members, service providers, and customers","Owner":"Local government, service providers, and community organizations"}]}
